General.Name: Tri Ocean Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Triocean Industrial Corporation Co., Ltd. focuses to engage in the construction business. It also engages in general investment; manufacture, processing, and trading textile products; wholesale of building materials; furniture trading; and manufacture of power generation, transmission, and distribution machinery. The company was formerly known as Tri Ocean Textile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Triocean Industrial Corporation Co., Ltd. in September 2021. Triocean Industrial Corporation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1968 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
